entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
